post.title: fs: bnib apple iphone 3gs 16gb unlocked (black)
post.content: i have a brand new unlocked apple iphone 3gs 16gb (black) still in the box. i don't know what's included inside because i haven't opened it before still! it will come with everything that's in the box. this is factory unlocked, hong kong version!! asking price: $700cad or $700cad + shipping if not local. i can meet up during weekends pretty much anywhere in the gta. i can send pictures if necessary. pls email me at for fastest response. thanks for looking! -michael
